name: Spectacular Overnight Slaw Recipe
author: bfr610
summary: To come up with this dish, I used a number of different recipes plus some ideas of my own. It's great for potluck because it's made the night before and the flavor keeps getting better. Whenever I serve it I'm inundated with recipe requests.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped green bell pepper
½ cup chopped red bell pepper
directions: Mix cabbage, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, carrots, and olives together in a large bowl
Whisk vinegar, oil, sugar, Dijon mustard, salt, celery seed, and mustard seed together in a saucepan
Bring to a boil; cook and stir  until sugar is dissolved, about 1 minute
Pour hot dressing over cabbage mixture and toss gently
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight
